quote: "In My Experience, When You Think You Understand The Force, You Realize Just How Little You Know."
author: Ahsoka Tano

quote: "I used to believe that being a good soldier meant doing everything they told you. That's how they engineered us. But we're not droids. We're not programmed. You have to learn to make your own decisions"
author: CT-7567 aka Captain Rex

quote: "That might be the Mandalorian way. But it's not my way. Not anymore."
author: Sabine Wren

quote: "Anakin, You're Breaking My Heart. You're Going Down A Path I Can't Follow."
author: Padm√© Amidala
source: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith

quote: "I can bring you in warm, or I can bring you in cold."
author: Din Djarin

quote: "You Failed, Your Highness. I Am A Jedi, Like My Father Before Me."
author: Luke Skywalker
source: Star Wars: The Return of the Jedi

quote: "Did You Ever Hear The Tragedy Of Darth Plagueis The Wise?"
author: Darth Sidious aka Sheev Palpatine
source: Star Wars: The Revenge of the Sith

quote: "I don't like sand. It's coarse, rough, irritating, and it gets everywhere."
author: Anakin Skywalker
source: Star Wars: Attack of the Clones

quote: "Be Careful Not To Choke On Your Aspirations, Director!"
author: Darth Vader
Chewbacca
source: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
